name: Accept/Application acknowledgement code
description: HL7-defined table specifying the acknowledgement status codes for application-level message processing

values.definition: Message accepted and processed successfully by receiving application
Message rejected due to application errors, modified version may be resent
Message rejected and not processed, may resend same message later

notes: Used in MSA-1 (Message Acknowledgment) field to indicate application-level processing status. Essential for reliable message processing workflows.

vendorVariations.epic: Standard implementation with detailed error messaging in ERR segments for AE/AR responses
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses standard codes with organization-specific error handling procedures
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with configurable retry mechanisms for AR responses
